author: markt
msg: Implement fall-back for checking for failure when socket is closed before client can read response. Fixes intermittent issue on Windows.

author: michim
msg: ZOOKEEPER-1536 c client : memory leak in winport.c (brooklin via michim)

author: veithen
msg: Ensure that DOM attributes representing namespace declarations retain their identity, i.e. that querying such an attribute returns the same/original instance, not an instance generated on the fly.
This change should also solve the issue with the patch proposed in AXIOM-423.

author: cframpton
msg: Revert 1379026.  Need to timing for createImage.
